definitions.definition: A tool used for threshing , consisting of a long handle (handstock) with a shorter stick ( swipple or swingle ) attached with a short piece of chain, thong or similar material.
A weapon which has the (usually spherical ) striking part attached to the handle with a flexible joint such as a chain .

main_definition: A tool used for threshing , consisting of a long handle (handstock) with a shorter stick ( swipple or swingle ) attached with a short piece of chain, thong or similar material.
secondary_definitions: A weapon which has the (usually spherical ) striking part attached to the handle with a flexible joint such as a chain .
